name: Mulberry Horror-A Virtual Haunted Attraction
blurb: Mulberry Horror will force you to face your darkest nightmares and be automatically ensnared in a web of eerie paranormal experiences.

rewards.reward: You've made that first step, that leap of faith in us that proves you want Mulberry Horror to happen as much as we do and for this... you rock! With absolute appreciation, you get an exclusive collection of Mulberry Horror wallpapers for your desktop designed by Roy Mildor, famed Second Life artist.\r\n\r\nPLUS: A special \u201cThank You\u201d listing on www.wix.com/loumannock/mulberryhorror, including your name and URL link to your website (keep it tasteful!)

It's confirmed. You love us and you most definitely are a true Mulberry Horror fan. To prove our ostentatious dedication to you we are giving away a custom made, one-of-a-kind Mulberry Horror refrigerator magnet designed by Roy Mildor, famed Second Life artist.
*Will only ship in the U.S. (No international shipping available).

You will also receive the goodies described above.

What looks great on your desk or work station? How about a custom made Mulberry Horror mousepad to keep your mouse dust-free and sailing smooth? Well, this baby printed in full color not only looks great but also screams (no pun intended) "I would kill to own!" *Will only ship in the U.S. (No international shipping available). We want you to have this as our way of saying thanks, AND... You will also receive the goodies described above.

With our indebted merriment, you\u2019ll receive the following: An MP3 of Mulberry Horror's musical score written & composed by Lou Mann. This complete album is chock-full of the most skin-crawling, goose-bumpy horror noises and music you've ever heard. Don't listen while in the dark! *MP3 will be emailed. You will also receive the goodies described above.

Here's the one everyone's been waiting for... Mulberry Horror T's! To display our unabashed gratification, you\u2019ll receive the following: A one of a kind collectible Mulberry Horror T-shirt designed by Roy Mildor, famed Second Life connoisseur of the greatest kind! \r\n*Will only ship in the U.S. (No international shipping available). \r\nYou will also receive the goodies described above. *SIZES AVAILABLE: ADULT (S, M, L, XL) $4 extra for 2X and $5 extra for 3X applies.

By now we're banging our heads against the wall out of insanity on how thankful we are! You\u2019ll receive the following: EVERY CINEMATIC SOUND you hear while holding your breath and tip-toeing the desolate streets of Mulberry Horror. That's right... every unholy atmospheric sound in an MP3 format. You will also receive the goodies described above.

If you've come this far, know this... you are gods and goddesses to all the staff here at Bruized Karma Studios! We bow before your cunning wisdom for making this project come to a shimmering life, and instead of sacrificing an innocent baby lamb, we present this just for you: A custom made iPod Touch case with a Mulberry Horror design specifically imagined by the psychotic mind of Roy Mildor (there's that guy again!) Vibrantly printed in full color, this iPod Touch case will make you the talk of the town. *Will only ship in the U.S. (No international shipping available). You will also receive the goodies described above.

At this point your generous pledges have exorcised our demons and for this our loved ones are more than grateful!\r\nYou will receive a personalized photo session with Second Life renown artist (gasp, him again???) Roy Mildor!!! Who not only will pose you and snap your photograph (clothing optional), but will make damn sure it look so ridiculously professional you'll be wanting to come back for more. * FOR SECOND LIFE RESIDENTS. You will also receive the goodies described above.

We've done everything under the dark, vast heavens that you've asked for... and more! How else can we bestow upon you our deepest and most sincerest thanks for helping to make this project come true???\r\nHow about a personal, one-on-one live and intimate performance by the legendary Lou Mannock? You've read right! Lou Mannock will perform for you all an unforgettable concert with an unending plethora of songs from his 400 song collection of rock songs. How's that in your face! You will get a 2 hour concert in Second Life (*For Second Life Residents) \r\nAND.... AND.... You will most graciously walk away full of slobbering happiness, like a kid on Christmas morning, with a goodies bag packed with all the prizes described above.
